text: Vin til聞ky zaboronyaye dlya vas kharchuvannya tvaryn shcho vmyrayete sebe (bez lyuds聞koho vtruchannya), krov, m'yaso svyney, ta tvaryny prysvyatyly do za vynyatkom BOHA. Yakshcho kozhnyy prymushuyet聞sya (shchob z'yisty tsey), bez toho, shchob buty malicious abo umysnyy, vin ne zaznaye hrikha. BOH Forgiver, Naybil聞sh Myloserdnyy
